scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Eustace kneeling in prayer in a landscape. He is dressed in a blue tunic with red sleeves and black boots, and a halo encircles his head. To his left stands a brown horse adorned with a blue saddle cloth. To his right, a brown stag with antlers is prominently featured. In the background, a winding river flows through a valley, with a fortified tower and other buildings on a hill. In the upper part of the frame, a small, stylized figure, possibly representing God or an angel, is depicted in the sky, with rays of light descending. The overall scene is framed by decorative floral motifs.
